name: Gravely
description:
Gravely

The dead walk... and they want you!

Gravely is a first person horror survival game.
Find weapons along the way to help you out. Look for the runestone portals for salvation!

NEW!  Try out a shortened web version:

https://gravely-2ab39.firebaseapp.com/

Controls

Move - W,A,S,Z
Run - Hold SHIFT key 
Attack/Fire - Left mouse button
Fire Bow - Left to arm, then Right to fire
E - pickup item
P - pause
Tab - toggle inventory
Space - jump

Good luck!
